CalCEN 0.0.1.0000
  • Reference

Candida albicans Co-expression analysis

Teresa R. O’Meara, Matthew J. O’Meara DeORFanizing Candida albicans Genes using Coexpression https://doi.org/10.1128/mSphere.01245-20

Install

git clone git@github.com:maomlab/CalCEN
cd CalCEN
Rscript -e "devtools::install_local('.')"
